text: is a Japanese politician and the governor of Kanagawa Prefecture located in Kantō region of Japan.Kanagawa Prefecture: Mr. Yuji Kuroiwa, Governor, Foreign press Center Japan, November 20, 2013.The Anchor Man: Kanagawa Governor Yuji Kuroiwa, Tokyo Weekender, July 22, 2013. ==Biography== Kuroiwa was born on 26 September 1954 in Kobe, the capital city of Hyōgo Prefecture in Kansai region of Japan. == References == ==External links== * Category:People from Kobe Category:Politicians from Hyōgo Prefecture Category:Waseda University alumni Category:Governors of Kanagawa Prefecture Category:1954 births Category:Living people
title: Yūji Kuroiwa
